metadata.title: CVE-2024-13722 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The "NagVis" component within Checkmk is vulnerable to reflected cross-sitescripting. An attacker can craft a malicious link that will executearbitrary JavaScript in the context of the browser once clicked. The attackcan be performed on both authenticated and unauthenticated users.

criterions.comment: nagvis package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
